      • closestEnemy

        public static int closestEnemy(Tower tower,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies)
        a.
        Parameters:
        tower - - A reference to the specific Tower object that is that is looking for its closest enemy
        enemies - - A reference to the ArrayList storing the enemies (to locate the closest one)
        Returns:

      • isAnEnemyInRange

        public static boolean isAnEnemyInRange(Tower tower,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies)
        a.
        Parameters:
        tower - - A reference to the specific Tower object that is that is looking for any enemies in range (must not have passed the Tower)
        enemies - - A reference to the ArrayList storing the enemies (to check if any are in range)
        Returns:
        boolean - Representing if there is indeed an enemy that the Tower is able to shoot
